data.name: Salome's Kiss Adult Patch
data.detailed_description:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Salome's Kiss, including:

  • Three uncensored sex scenes
  • Three new CGs
  • About 6,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Salome's Kiss, to download.
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectXÂ® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC adds three uncensored lesbian sex scenes in the story, which are scattered through the story.
